package.name: vld
package.summary: Provides functionality to dump the internal representation of PHP scripts
package.description: The Vulcan Logic Disassembler hooks into the Zend Engine and dumps all the opcodes (execution units) of a script.

release.notes: This release adds a lot of Zend Engine 2 support, fixes some bugs and changes the way on how VLD is activated. Only if the configure setting "vld.active" is set to "1" it will dump the op arrays.
